channel.title: Louis Massiah on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘TCB – The Toni Cade Bambara School of Organizing’ Review: A Riveting Documentary That Reveals the Person Behind the Icon
item.description: In “TCB – The Toni Cade Bambara School of Organizing,” Louis Massiah and Monica Henriquez avoid the trap many directors of biographical films fall into. It’s hard to capture a full life in less
